title: The Rise of Grace Butler: The Consulting Hero
summary: Grace Butler, a 21-year-old coaching and consulting hobbyist, discovers her superpowers and combats a mysterious corporation, transforming herself into a heroic figure over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Grace Butler, eine 21-jährige Hobbyberaterin, entdeckt ihre Superkräfte und bekämpft eine geheimnisvolle Gesellschaft, und verwandelt sich im Laufe einer Woche in eine Heldin.
summaryDutch: Grace Butler, een 21-jarige hobbycoach en consultant, ontdekt haar superkrachten en vecht tegen een mysterieus bedrijf, en transformeert zichzelf in de loop van een week in een heldhaftige figuur.
summaryFrench: Grace Butler, une jeune femme de 21 ans passionnée de coaching et de conseil, découvre ses superpouvoirs et combat une entreprise mystérieuse, se transformant en héroïne au fil d'une semaine.

story.text: Grace discovers her ability to visualize solutions with supernatural clarity during a consulting session. An unknown observer notes her talent.
She uses her power at a startup pitch, helping them restructure their strategy. Grace feels surprisingly invigorated.
The mysterious corporation sends agents to gauge her abilities. Grace outruns and outsmarts them using her quick thinking.
Feeling the weight of the attention, Grace confides in her mentor, who encourages her to embrace her gifts for the greater good.
Deciding to take action, Grace uses her consulting sessions to subtly dismantle the corporation's influence from within.
Her actions lead to a community uprising, supporting her in a peaceful protest. She feels overwhelmingly supported and strong.
The peaceful resolution leads to reforms in corporate accountability. Grace feels triumphant and prepared for her next challenge.

ending: As the sun set on Sunday, Grace knew that her journey was just beginning, but she was ready to face whatever came next.
moral: True power lies in empowering others.
